name: Virgin Indian Hair {Body Wave}
description:
Virgin Hair is at it's highest demand. Why spend more for the same quality when you can receive beautiful full VIRGIN hair at a reasonable cost. 

Virgin Hair is not processed with any chemicals and is 100% real virgin hair. 
The hair can be dyed any color and styled in numerous ways. Once the hair is washed it will return to its natural state. 


To maintain hair All Virgin Hair Boutique Recommends that you wash your hair at least every 2 weeks. At night to 2 strand twist your hair at night.  Always brush your hair out with a wig brush.
